description.value:
Revelers in lost glee are twisted apparitions that arise in desolate and abandoned places where people once found great joy. They take immense mirth in causing harm or discomfort to others and do not enjoy being attuned to animists who fail to laugh at their antics.

Apparition Skills Circus Lore, Fortune-Telling Lore

Apparition Spells Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Prestidigitation]; 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dizzying Colors]; 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Laughing Fit]; 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hypnotize]; 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Confusion]; 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Scene]; 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vibrant Pattern]; 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Warp Mind]; 8th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Quandary]; 9th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wails of the Damned]

Vessel Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Trickster's Mirrors]

Avatar Ringmaster of the Dark Celebration Speed 50 feet, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain

Melee 1 ringmaster's whip (reach 15 feet, trip), Damage @Damage[(6d10+6)[slashing]]

Ranged 1 feast of the lost (acid, range 120 feet, versatile void), Damage @Damage[(6d6+6)[acid]]
